metadata.synopsis: Complaining about crime in the city. Random dwarf male.
metadata.how_to_trigger: CTY_Main_A, LOW, teleport to S_LOW_Prison_Door_TeleportTo_6be6fb14-3920-4765-b2db-ce2f34b5246b, talk to the NPC

0.speaker: Thatmatt Oakhide
0.text: If you're here to report something, don't bother - the Fist don't give a damn.

1.speaker: Thatmatt Oakhide
1.text: I don't leave my house now without a blade - the hell is this city coming to?

2.speaker: Thatmatt Oakhide
2.text: I don't leave my house now without a blade in case - wait. Where's my dagger?! Gods damn it, do thieves have no shame?
